title: # 493 - Andy Frasco & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with Singer/Songwriter Andy Frasco. Andy has a band called “Andy Frasco & The U.N.” We talk about mushrooms, sex addiction, heart break, day drinking, life on the road, his band, and much more! 

 

Follow Andy here

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/andyfrasco 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/andyfrasco 

 

This episode is brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code BERT at http://www.Manscaped.com
